H0.text: Man Ray was famous in what field. Painting

H1.text: Man Ray was famous in what field. Sculpture

H2.text: Man Ray was famous in what field. Film

H3.text: Man Ray was famous in what field. Photo's

A4.text: He was a photography innovator as well as a fashion and portrait photographer, and is noted for his work with photograms, which he called 'rayographs' in reference to himself.

A5.text: His 1923 experimental film Le Retour Ã  la raison was the first 'cine-rayograph', a motion picture made without the use of a camera.
